local_intent: Re-detect and align to the T-block, execute one incremental push (0.1m at 180 deg), then verify visibility.
assumptions: Planar contact remains valid during push
End-effector is free and safe to contact the block
coherence_with_global: Implements one cycle of the Repeat->Push phase: perceive (DetectObject), approach/align (ApproachAndAlign), act (Push with specified params), verify (IsObjectVisible). Parameters match global values and timing bins.
